review: I visited the doctor mainly for my father and I am really happy with the doctor's consultation. I am completely satisfied with the doctor and the doctor's treatment. It was only about 5-10 minutes i waited for the consultation. When it comes to improvement about staff and maintenance, everything was good. I would really like to recommend the doctor to all my friends and family.

\"The consultation was good. The doctor is very good, had visited for my wife, the doctor was listing to my problems, he explained to us very well about the problem now the problem is cured. This was our first visit to the doctor we are happy the overall thing. \r\n\

review: The doctor is more interested in saying "no" and "nothing" instead of explaining what may be wrong or OK, and how to go about managing the symptoms. He also does not say anything about the illness or related issues such as diet or lifestyle unless you specifically ask him, *** **** **** ** ** ********* ** ****** *********
